name: MPMediaPlaylist
desc: A playable collection of related media items.

items.name: func addItem(withProductID: String, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Adds the item associated with the product identifier to the end of the playlist.

items.name: func add([MPMediaItem], completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Adds an array of media items to the end of the playlist.

items.name: var authorDisplayName: String?
items.desc: App defined display name for the playlist.

items.name: var descriptionText: String?
items.desc: User supplied text that describes the playlist.

items.name: var persistentID: MPMediaEntityPersistentID
items.desc: The persistent identifier for the playlist.

items.name: var cloudGlobalID: String?
items.desc: The cloud identifier for the playlist.

items.name: var playlistAttributes: MPMediaPlaylistAttribute
items.desc: The attributes associated with the playlist

items.name: struct MPMediaPlaylistAttribute
items.desc: Attributes define the type of playlist.

items.name: var seedItems: [MPMediaItem]?
items.desc: The items seeded to generate the playlist; applies only to Genius playlists.
